sentences.en: A puerile tear dimmed my eye while I looked a tear of disappointment and impatience.
sentences.cn: 我看啊看的,一滴孩子气的眼泪使我的眼睛模糊了.那是一滴失望和焦急的眼泪.

sentences.en: At their most puerile , games are a grand hack.
sentences.cn: 在他们最纯真的, 游戏是一辆华丽的马车.

sentences.en: Concert organisers branded the group's actions as puerile.
sentences.cn: 音乐会的组织者指称该乐队的行为愚蠢幼稚。

sentences.en: He said that he never heard anything so puerile before.
sentences.cn: 他说他从没听过这样幼稚可笑的话.

sentences.en: He was more interested in states of mind than in " puerile superstitions, Gothic castles, and chimeras. "
sentences.cn: 他乐于描写心情, 而不愿意描写 “ 无聊的迷信, 尖拱式的堡垒和妖魔鬼怪. ”

sentences.en: He was trying to give puerile excuses.
sentences.cn: 他给出的借口总是愚蠢至极.

sentences.en: His puerile pranks sometimes offended his more mature friends.
sentences.cn: 他幼稚的恶作剧有时得罪他更加成熟的朋友.

sentences.en: Marked by or indicating a lack of maturity; puerile.
sentences.cn: 以未成熟为特征或显得未成熟的; 幼稚愚蠢的.

sentences.en: Puerile cerebral palsy is syndrome of cerebra trauma, which is concomitant with functional obstacles and hypogenesis.
sentences.cn: 小儿脑性瘫痪是一种大脑受损的综合症, 伴有多种功能障碍和发育缺陷.

sentences.en: Puerile chronic persisting diarrhea is a kind of common disease.
sentences.cn: 迁延性、慢性腹泻是小儿常见病,病因复杂,发病率高.

sentences.en: She was tired of answering these puerile questions.
sentences.cn: 她回答这些幼稚的问题觉得不胜其烦.

sentences.en: The belief in it issues from the puerile egos of inferior men.
sentences.cn: 这种信仰是下等人幼稚的自私意识中产生的.

sentences.en: The story is simple, even puerile.
sentences.cn: 故事很简单，甚至有些幼稚。

sentences.en: These discussions have always seemed a bit puerile to me.
sentences.cn: 对我而言,这些讨论总是显得有些幼稚.
